messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Undead Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We got reports of undead coming towards the station, get ready people

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Great job Space Station 13, the zombie threat has been elimanted. However we have detected unknown lifesigns coming your way. Centcom out.

-Intern Jerry Seinfeld

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. A squad of nanotraesen death marines has been stationed on the mining outpost. Anyone seen to tresspass will be shot on sight. Your station has been claimed for quarentine. Thank you for your cooperation.-CentComm.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Undead Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Undead Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention Marines! A syndicate nuclear ops team has boarded the station! STOP THEM!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention Deathsquad. Retreat to arrivals. We're going nuclear. This is a shitshow AND YOU HAVE FAILED!-Centcomm
